description: I wouldn't hang on to that for too long, its former owner might come after you. Let's just say you wouldn't want that.
name: Glowing Eye

description: A truly priceless trophy item.
name: Nether Star

description: A truly majestic trophy item.
name: Crown

description: A one of a kind trophy.
name: Dragon Egg

description: How did you get this???
name: Command Block

description: Used in crafting, can be obtained from a forest.
name: Wood

description: Wood from a fireproof tree found in the nether.
name: Crimson Wood

description: Pretty important to uh see.
name: Torch

description: Dirt cheap!
name: Dirt

description: Used in crafting, can be obtained from a beach.
name: Sand

description: Smelted from sand, you can see through it!
name: Glass

description: A hard stone formed when lava cools.
name: Obsidian

description: Well that's not a fish! Sea glass sure looks different to regular glass. Water bottles are commonly fished up in most places.
name: Water Bottle

description: A piece of cloud that fell from the sky.
name: Cloud

description: Found uncommonly by fishing in the jungle. Pointy!
name: Thorn

description: An uncommon drop from jungle enemies. Twisty!
name: Vine

description: A weird material, perhaps it could be useful in constructing a dangerous machine.
name: Prismarine Shard

description: Closely guarded by the Pumpkin Horseman, these seeds allow you to grow pumpkins.
name: Pumpkin Seed

description: Dropped by skeletons, some cultures see it as taboo, others make sure to utilise it wherever they can.
name: Bone

description: Spider silk, although cheap it becomes expensive to gather the quantities needed for clothing.
name: String

description: Seems to be connected to the magic of the Enderman.
name: Ender Pearl

description: This rod has a unique connection to fire, its composition is unknown.
name: Blaze Rod

description: A sticky ball of slime.
name: Slime Ball

description: Found uncommonly in most bodies of water. Since it's a plant, maybe magic could transform it into a flower?
name: Algae

description: Found rarely by fishing in jungles, these husks limit their speed, but greatly increase their defense. I wonder if it could be used by humans?
name: Beetle Husk

description: Found rarely from beetles in jungles, these husks are useful as a purple dye.
name: Violet Husk

description: Found very rarely by fishing in jungles, these shells limit their offense and speed, but drastically increase their defense. I wonder if it could be used by humans?
name: Turtle Shell

description: Very warm, might make a good coat. Limited supply, so high price fluctuations.
name: Seal Hide

description: Did you know there are many different solid phases of water?
name: Ice

description: Magma has pierced through this rock, be careful around it.
name: Magma Block

description: The most luxurious of collectibles. Afforded only by those that are the master of stonks. It's an investors dream.
name: Netherite Bar

description: This is a very magical crystal, it is said to give a special role to those who can afford it. (dm a manager for the role)
name: Magic Crystal

description: Plays Halo pretty fine.
name: Xbox Series X

description: The bald head of a bald person.
name: Blue's Bald Head

description: A drink not normally found here.
name: Vodka

description: A food not normally found here.
name: Potato

description: A nice tasty cookie.
name: Cookie

description: A nice tasty bucket of milk.
name: Milk

description: A nice tasty loaf of bread.
name: Bread

description: Nice some cooked fish.
name: Cooked Cod

description: Nice some cooked fish.
name: Cooked Salmon

description: A rare ancient fish with tough rock-like armor, found deep underground.
name: Rockfish

description: An aggressive fish found in the jungle.
name: Piranha

description: A juicy slice of watermelon.
name: Watermelon

description: Halloween decoration and food.
name: Pumpkin

description: Tasty yum food.
name: Sugar Cane

description: Tasty yum food.
name: Sugar

description: What came first the chicken or the egg?
name: Egg

description: Tasty yum food.
name: Pumpkin Pie

description: Maybe not so tasty, but you can still eat it.
name: Mud Pie

description: Cactus club!
name: Cactus

description: Best energy for your money, but limited supply.
name: Filet Mignon

description: It's a microwave, it uses the electromagnetic spectrum to heat your food.
name: Microwave

description: A high quality steak with gold flakes in it.
name: Golden Steak

description: Tasty mutton to eat.
name: Mutton

description: Tasty bacon to eat.
name: Bacon

description: Cream of Caramel, smells suspiciously of seal.
name: Caramel's Cream

description: Good for showing thanks during Thanksgiving.
name: Roasted Turkey

description: Literally trash, why would you buy this?
name: Moldy Bread

description: Slightly delicious, not that nutritious. Infuriates seal squad members.
name: Seal Meat

description: Very tasty, not very nutritious though
name: Cake

description: Can be crafted in to bread and cake, but poor energy on its own.
name: Wheat

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Copper Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Bronze Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Iron Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Silver Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Gold Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Diamond Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Emerald Pickaxe

description: Used to mine, more info in /pickaxes.
name: Netherite Pickaxe

description: The refined form of a slightly less common metal.
name: Titanium Bar

description: The basic form of a slightly less common metal.
name: Titanium Ore

description: A good item to buy and sell, fluctuates a ton like silver.
name: Emerald

description: Expensive investment, rarely fluctuates, when it does sure to be good though.
name: Diamond

description: Gold bar. Show off your wealth with this! Stable price, can hold a fair amount.
name: Gold Bar

description: Basic form of a rare metal.
name: Gold Ore

description: A bar of silver. Shiny. Worth less than gold, but fluctuates more. Investors love.
name: Silver Bar

description: Basic form of a fairly rare metal.
name: Silver Ore

description: A bar of iron. Used for industrial purposes.
name: Iron Bar

description: Basic form of a useful industrial metal.
name: Iron Ore

description: The first alloy.
name: Bronze Bar

description: The refined form of a common metal.
name: Tin Bar

description: From the far away lands of tinland, my dealer wont tell me where he gets it from.
name: Tin Ore

description: Copper Bar. Cheap, stable price. Good metal for machines and electronics.
name: Copper Bar

description: Basic form of a pretty common metal.
name: Copper Ore

description: A cheap industrial fuel.
name: Coal

description: A junk piece of ore that cannot be used, or can it?
name: Ore Chunk

description: Just a piece of stone.
name: Stone

description: A burnt piece of stone from the nether.
name: Blackstone

description: Lamp oil, fluctuates pretty heavily, a solid choice for starting investors.
name: Lamp Oil

description: A basic part for making machines in factories.
name: Basic Machine Part

description: Important part for making any factory to produce bars. Runs on coal.
name: Industrial Press

description: Important part for making any factory to cut metal. Runs on lamp oil.
name: Plasma Cutter

description: A basic item for making any part for a factory.
name: Screw

description: Used for.. well.. whenever you need a chain!
name: Chain

description: An advanced part for making machines in factories.
name: Advanced Machine Part

description: An important part for cutting in factories.
name: Diamond Saw

description: An important part for making machines in factories.
name: Generator

description: An important part for making certain machines in factories.
name: Soldering Iron

description: A useful element for advanced machines.
name: Raw Silicon

description: A useful item for making advanced parts.
name: Silicon Wafer

description: A useful item for making insulated wires.
name: Rubber

description: A useful way to transfer power between its source and its sink.
name: Charged Battery

description: A useful way to transfer power between its source and its sink.
name: Battery

description: A basic item for connecting machines.
name: Insulated Wiring

description: An advanced item for making advanced machines.
name: Gold Wiring

description: Important part for making food.
name: Mill

description: Incase you ever want to take over a country. Do not try at home.
name: Panzer 4

description: Wanna go to space? Go ahead! Who knows what else you can do with rocketry...
name: Falcon Heavy Rocket

description: A beginner fishing rod, here!
name: Old Rod

description: An intermediate fishing rod, voila!
name: Good Rod

description: An advanced fishing rod, behold!
name: Super Rod

description: A special fishing rod, since it has a silk line it will never break!
name: Silk Rod

description: This weapon will slice up a few things, although it is fragile.
name: Stone Sword

description: This hefty weapon will put a dent into a few things, although it is fragile.
name: Stone Axe

description: Produced by smiths since the ancient times, this weapon sill slice up some things.
name: Iron Sword

description: Produced by smiths since the ancient times, this hefty weapon will put a dent into some things
name: Iron Axe

description: This weapon will slice up a lot of things, and has a chance to do something special; breaks easily
name: Gold Sword

description: This hefty weapon will put a dent into a lot of things, and has a chance to do something special; breaks easily.
name: Gold Axe

description: The blue glimmer will put fear into enemies, this weapon will slice up most things.
name: Diamond Sword

description: The blue glimmer will put fear into enemies, this hefty weapon will put a dent into most things.
name: Diamond Axe

description: A celestial weapon, this weapon will pierce anything.
name: Comet Lance

description: A weapon fit for a God, this weapon will slice up anything.
name: Netherite Sword

description: A weapon fit for a God, this hefty weapon will put a dent into anything.
name: Netherite Axe

description: An enchanted sword that even the strongest warriors will fear.
name: Enchanted Sword

description: An enchanted shield that even the strongest warriors will fear.
name: Enchanted Shield

description: You may get some strange looks bringing this into a fight, but they won't be laughing soon.
name: Battering Ram

description: Overwhelms your enemy with a swarm of shurikens before they can react.
name: Shurikens

description: An ancient weapon, the faster you move, the stronger it swings.
name: Katana

description: Evens out attack and defense.
name: Evenife

description: A strong swing from this can handle any form of armored enemy; breaks easily.
name: Sledgehammer

description: This weapon goes first and does a fair amount of damage, this decimated the ancient legions of the past.
name: Spear

description: A favorite of assassins and thieves, does a lot of damage if it catches you off guard.
name: Dagger

description: If you see a zombie with this, prepare for a strong thud.
name: The Spade

description: A while ago a flood damaged a spring factory, many byproducts ran off into the river. Boiiing!
name: Springy Spring

description: A weapon forged and wielded by Piglin Brutes, who knows how they made it so light weight.
name: True Gold Axe

description: Used by wizards in the past to defend against foreign invaders. Shoots many smaller sparks.
name: Emerald Wand

description: YOU SHALL NOT PASS! Shoots a big spark.
name: Emerald Staff

description: Mwahahaha!
name: Flamethrower

description: A magic weapon that gets stronger every turn, this rainbow flower was often given as a sign of love in magic communities. It used to naturally occur, now it can only be crafted with magic.
name: Power Flower

description: Plays a soothing melody, yet its notes are deadly, heavy rain took this flute from a live performance in Sky City into a lake.
name: Flute

description: A celestial weapon, this weapon will rain mayhem onto the battlefield.
name: Meteor Staff

description: A godly weapon used by Zeus himself.
name: Master Bolt

description: A beginner bow, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Wood Bow

description: An intermediate bow, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Tin Bow

description: An advanced bow, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Gold Bow

description: A special bow that shoots twice, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Dual Bow

description: Fighting is so last century, once you have mastered rocketry, you can blow your enemies up instead!
name: Rocket Launcher

description: A celestial weapon, this weapon will annihilate your enemies.
name: Star Launcher

description: Produced by smiths since the ancient times, this armor is light.
name: Iron Boots

description: Produced by smiths since the ancient times, this armor can stand some blows.
name: Iron Chestplate

description: The blue gimmer will put fear into enemies, this armor is light and strong.
name: Diamond Boots

description: The blue gimmer will put fear into enemies, this armor can stand most blows.
name: Diamond Chestplate

description: Sacrificed a bit of protection for the extra damage from the thorns.
name: Thorns Chestplate

description: Made of solid titanium nothing will get through this, although it can slow you down.
name: Titanium Chestplate

description: Made of a silver-titanium alloy this armor is unusually dense.
name: Dense Chestplate

description: Armor fit for a God, this armor can stand all blows.
name: Netherite Helmet

description: Celestial armor, this armor can stand all blows.
name: Comet Armor

description: Celestial equipment, these goggles help you mine and fish.
name: Starlight Goggles

description: You wouldn't think a wreath of flowers provides much defense, and you would be right, but it does heal you up pretty good! Its flowers used to naturally occur, now it can only be crafted with magic.
name: Floral Armor

description: Made from bones, this chestplate feels taboo, but it has some special benefits.
name: Bone Chestplate

description: Made from chains, this armor is light weight, but it also benefits piercing damage.
name: Chainmail Chestplate

description: Buffs double ore chance.
name: Mining Helmet

description: Strongly buffs double ore chance.
name: Rock Helmet

description: Buffs fishing strength.
name: Fishing Cap

description: Strongly buffs fishing strength.
name: Magic Fishing Cap

description: Buffs max health and defense.
name: Leather

description: Buffs speed and damage.
name: Grappling Hook

description: Gives a weak buff to every stat, drops when killing an enemy; consumable.
name: Experience

description: Gives a buff to every stat, drops when killing an enemy; consumable.
name: Packed Experience

description: Gives a strong buff to every stat, drops when killing an enemy; consumable.
name: Dense Experience

description: Wings let you fly to new places, these special wings are attracted to devil rays confusing it for their former masters.
name: Unholy Wings

description: Wings let you fly to new places, these special wings are dropped by Dragons.
name: Scaly Wings

description: Wings let you fly to new places, these special wings are dropped by Solar Flares.
name: Photon Wings

description: Wings let you fly to new places, these special wings are dropped by Sky Sorcerers.
name: Crystal Wings

description: Wings let you fly to new places, these special wings are dropped by Hallowed Creatures.
name: Holy Wings

description: It's a prickly shield, breaks fairly easily.
name: Cactus Shield

description: Prevents some attacks from going first, however it is weak to strong attacks.
name: Shield

description: Gives extra health; consumable.
name: Bread Bundle

description: You can feel the raw power coming from this gauntlet.
name: Gauntlet

description: A special bell that regenerates your health.
name: Heal Bell

description: You may get some strange looks bringing this into a fight, but the only damage that will go through this is emotional.
name: Portable Wall

description: "Mystify, mislead, and surprise the enemy" - Sun Tzu
name: Binoculars

description: An impressive piece of old jewelry. Loses hp but increases defense and damage.
name: Gold Bracelet

description: Made from bones, this was a common piece of jewelry long long ago.
name: Bone Ring

description: Whenever your weapon or armor would break, this gets used instead; one time use.
name: Silk Cloth

description: The only way for us puny humans to use magic weapons, this is crystallised magic; consumable.
name: Mana Crystal

description: Reduces incoming magic damage.
name: Magic Guard

description: An extra silky string! Use this and your fishing line will never break.
name: Silky String

description: Ew! Buffs fishing strength.
name: Chum

description: Allows you to fish in lava!
name: Lavaproof Fishing Hook

description: Buffs double ore chance.
name: Mining Charm

description: This strange indestructible coin makes its holder extra lucky!
name: Lucky Coin

description: Buffs all types of damage; consumable.
name: Strength Potion

description: Doubles piercing damage; consumable.
name: Cactus Potion

description: Buffs blunt damage and defense; consumable.
name: Iron Potion

description: Triples defense, but halves speed and halves attack; consumable.
name: Turtle Master Potion

description: Doubles defense, but halves speed; consumable.
name: Beetle Master Potion

description: Boosts double ore chance; consumable.
name: Mining Potion

description: Boosts fishing power and only consumes less bait; consumable.
name: Fishing Potion

description: A cheap arrow, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Wooden Arrow

description: A sharp arrow, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Bone Arrow

description: An expensive arrow, superiory archery often was the main reason for success in ancient battles.
name: Emerald Arrow

description: Once you have mastered rocketry, its time to blow through some armor!
name: Armor Penetrating Rocket

description: Once you have mastered rocketry, its time for a massive explosion!
name: Explosive Rocket

description: A celestial fragment, can be crafted into various weapons and armors, as well as used as ammo.
name: Comet Fragment

description: Eww a worm. Can be used as bait.
name: Worm

description: A nice juicy fruit found in jungles. Can be used as bait.
name: Mango

description: Hey guys, welcome back to another scicraft episode!
name: Ilmango

description: Ew who eats raw fish. Can be used as bait
name: Raw Cod

description: Ew who eats raw fish. Can be used as bait.
name: Raw Salmon

description: Is this safe to eat? Can be used as bait.
name: Pufferfish

description: Mommy can we get one? Good bait.
name: Goldfish

description: Not to be confused with the elusive Gold Gold Goldfish. Top tier bait.
name: Gold Goldfish

description: A small piece of expensive squid meat. Top tier bait.
name: Squid

description: Oo la la! Top tier dinner, top tier bait.
name: Seafood Dinner

description: A small piece of squid meat stuffed full with emeralds, if it wasn't expensive before it definitely is now. Top tier bait.
name: Emerald Squid

description: This worm is living lavishly that's for sure. Top tier bait.
name: Netherite Worm

description: A worm infused with magic. Super bait.
name: Glowing Worm

description: A fish that learnt to fly, can be made with magic. Super bait.
name: Flying Fish

description: A cod infused with magic. Super bait.
name: Glowing Cod

description: I think it's just a normal shrimp. Super bait.
name: Shrimp Shrimp

description: A squid that learnt to fly. Super bait.
name: Flying Squid

description: An octopus infused with magic. Super bait.
name: Blue Ringed Octopus

description: This alien species evolved to protect their comet, not to be confused with starfish. Super bait.
name: Star Fish

description: This ray flew from hell. Super bait.
name: Devil Ray
